title: Simulation-Based Leukemia Diagnosis and Treatment Education Module

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Knowledge (Hematology, Pathology) and Fundamental Physiological Concepts
context.additional_context: Blended education combining VR simulations and e-learning modules in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Ability to classify leukemia types (acute/chronic, lymphocytic/myeloid) with 90% accuracy
Identification of morphological characteristics of leukemia cells through blood smear VR simulation with ≥85% accuracy
Selection of leukemia treatment protocols (chemotherapy/immunotherapy) with 80% accuracy by analyzing virtual patient cases
Interpretation of pathological findings and clinical symptoms in bone marrow examination simulations with ≥75% accuracy
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
